entry.title: Our Most Read Stories This Week: BTC Breaks 60k, UNI Fee Switch, Airdrops Come to Bitcoin, Aptos Interview
entry.summary: The Defiant's most read stories for the week of Feb. 26.

entry.title: Institutional Investors Are Farming Liquid Restaking Tokens For Yield
entry.summary: MEV Capital says liquid staking offers market-neutral ETH yields.

entry.title: Infamous Three Arrows Founders Return to Peddle ‘Supercycle’ Narrative
entry.summary: Kyle Davies and Su Zhu are back on Twitter, posting about the current bull run.

entry.title: Airdrops Arrive On Bitcoin With Ordinals Project Runestones
entry.summary: More than 112,000 Ordinals wallets are eligible for the airdrop.

entry.title: Tron Hits All-time High of $2M In Daily Fees
entry.summary: The controversial blockchain has carved out a niche as the go-to network for USDT transfers.

entry.title: Metis Integrates Chainlink’s Cross-Chain Interoperability Protocol Amid Restaking Push
entry.summary: Metis partners with EigenLayer and Renzo Finance to roll out Ethereum restaking.

entry.title: Portal Debuts at Lofty $2.5B Valuation
entry.summary: The PORTAL token is native to the eponymous company aiming to be the gateway to web3 gaming.

entry.title: Robinhood Partners With Arbitrum to Ease Layer 2 Access
entry.summary: Robinhood Wallet users will be able to swap tokens on Arbitrum-based DEXs.

entry.title: Blast Mainnet Goes Live Ahead Of Schedule
entry.summary: Memecoins dominate activity as degens flock to the much-hyped Ethereum Layer 2 network in pursuit of the next 100x trade.

entry.title: Ondo To Use Blockchains as Middleware to Trade Traditional Securities
entry.summary: Ondo Global Markets will access traditional stock exchanges under the hood.

entry.title: Markets See Violent Volatility Amid Record Bitcoin ETF Activity
entry.summary: Spot Bitcoin ETFs drove $8B in trade volume and received $637M worth of inflows on Feb. 28.

entry.title: Prominent Lawyer Gabriel Shapiro Introduces Effort to Synthesize Crypto and Law
entry.summary: The venture aims to explore the intersection of code and law, culminating in establishing an alternative legal system

entry.title: Crypto Rally Breaks Websites And Apps Including Coinbase
entry.summary: Users are reporting outages on Coinbase, Coingecko, and Robinhood, among others.

entry.title: Telegram’s TON Flies on Planned Ad-Sharing Program
entry.summary: Telegram founder Pavel Durov shared the details in his Telegram channel.

entry.title: EtherFi Closes $23M Series A Round As Eigenlayer TVL Surpasses $9B
entry.summary: EtherFi accounts for 36% of the $4.65B locked in liquid staking protocols.

entry.title: Bitcoin Goes Parabolic As Massive Inflows In ETFs Push It Beyond $60,000
entry.summary: The top crypto has reached levels not seen since November 2021, jumping 6.5% in the past 24 hours.

entry.title: Centrifuge Proposal Set To Introduce Protocol Fees Collected By Treasury
entry.summary: Centrifuge predicts it will accumulate $4M in fees this year.

entry.title: Merlin Chain’s Surging Growth Pushes Bitcoin’s DeFi TVL Past $2B
entry.summary: Users have piled nearly $1.6B into the launch campaign for the Merlin Chain Layer 2 and its MERL token.

entry.title: DePIN Sector Sees Resurgence In 2024
entry.summary: Key entrepreneurs and investors say that the infrastructure is ready.

entry.title: Lens Protocol Goes Permissionless
entry.summary: The move aims to attract more developers to build out Lens’ decentralized social media graph.

entry.title: Fidelity Canada Recommend 1-3% of Crypto Allocation in Portfolios
entry.summary: The financial firm' all-in-one ETF page now recommends 1-3% of crypto allocations.

entry.title: Dune Analytics Partners With Cloud Computing Giant Snowflake
entry.summary: Dune’s data will be integrated into Snowflake’s marketplace.

entry.title: Arkis Raises $2.2 Million To Accelerate Institutional Adoption Of DeFi
entry.summary: The pre-seed round led by gumi Cryptos Capital included G1 Ventures, Psalion VC, and Roosh Ventures.

entry.title: Uniswap Adds New Features Including Limit Orders
entry.summary: Limits orders are available starting today, whereas the browser extension will be live in 4-6 weeks.

entry.title: Gauntlet Partners With Morpho As TVL Rises
entry.summary: After Gauntlet dropped Aave last week, the move intensifies tensions between the decentralized lending protocols.

entry.title: Blast Schedules Mainnet Launch As TVL Pushed Above $2B
entry.summary: Blast appears poised to rank as the third-largest Ethereum Layer 2 by TVL at launch.

entry.title: Safe and Base Team Up To Promote Ethereum Smart Accounts
entry.summary: Base offers up to 1 ETH in gas rebates for smart account developers.

entry.title: Bitcoin Surges Above $54,000
entry.summary: ETH is trading above $3,150 as crypto markets continue to cheer positive ETF flows.

entry.title: LDO Spikes 10% On Fake Revenue Sharing Proposal
entry.summary: The since-deleted proposal in Lido’s governance forum floated the idea of revenue being distributed to LDO stakers.

entry.title: Aptos (APT): Ex-Facebook Engineers Aim For 1 Million TXN/S
entry.summary: Today we're joined by Aptos co-founder and CTO Avery Ching. Aptos is a Layer 1 blockchain developed by former Facebook employees that launched towards the end of 2022. We cover everything from the fundamental and technical aspects of Aptos to current and future use cases.

entry.summary: Parcl To Drop Between 7% and 8% of token’s supply to early adopters in April

entry.summary: DeFi token market cap approaches $100B for the first time in almost 22 months.

entry.title: Jupiter Founder Meow Is Frustrated. Here's Why.

In today's interview we have a very friendly conversation with Meow where he gets frank about his feelings and thought about all the misinformation and controversy.

Solana Airdrops show no sign of slowing down, so starting with the Jupiter airdrop, today’s guide will ensure you know where to start your Airdrop farming journey.
